name: Myriad Group A.G.
address: 11 avenue du Lac de Constance 73370 Le Bourget du lac
description: Myriad delivers consumer applications, messaging solutions, and embedded software to leading OEMs, mobile operators, and pay TV providers worldwide. We operate worldwide, with headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland. Myriad is listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange (SIX Symbol: MYRN).
